Description: "IntegronFinder identify integrons with high accuracy and sensitivity.It searches for attC sites using covariance models, for integron-integrases using HMM profiles, and for other features (promoters, attI site) using pattern matching"
EDAM_operations: Nucleic acid feature detection, Sequence motif recognition, Protein feature detection, Genome annotation
EDAM_reduced_operations: Nucleic acid feature detection, Sequence motif recognition, Protein feature detection, Genome annotation
EDAM_reduced_topics: Functional genomics, Mobile genetic elements, Molecular biology, Sequence analysis
EDAM_topics: Functional genomics, Mobile genetic elements, Molecular biology, Sequence analysis
bio.tool_description: A tool to detect Integron in DNA sequences.
